markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2198) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 224, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 78</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The Jalmeri Heavenseeker archetype as printed in Lost Omens: Impossible Lands is legal for play. Players may not use the version printed in Pathfinder #158: Six Feet Under._

**Archetype** [Jalmeri Heavenseeker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=198)

**Prerequisites**
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900), or you've trained with a champion of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven

</column>

---

You become trained in either [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11); if you were already trained in both these skills, you become an expert in one of them instead. You gain either the [Ki Rush](/Feats.aspx?ID=432) or [Ki Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=433) monk feat, which grants you a ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) activity as a [monk](/Classes.aspx?ID=8) does. If you already have both feats, you can instead choose a single 1st-level [monk feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=8/feats).

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the Jalmeri Heavenseeker or [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18) archetypes.

<title level="2">Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication leads to...</title>
[Heaven's Thunder](/Feats.aspx?ID=2199), [Sky and Heaven Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2200), [Speaking Sky](/Feats.aspx?ID=2204), [Steal the Sky](/Feats.aspx?ID=2202)
name: Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication
prerequisite: Student of Perfection Dedication, or you've trained with a champion of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven
prerequisite_markdown: [Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900), or you've trained with a champion of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven

</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 224</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900), or you've trained with a champion of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Your skill and dedication have set you on a path to master the techniques of Jalmeray's greatest martial artists.
</summary>
summary: Your skill and dedication have set you on a path to master the techniques of Jalmeray's greatest martial artists.
